00038 // public objects ------------------------------------------------------------
00039 QActive *QF::active_[QF_MAX_ACTIVE + 1];        // to be used by QF ports only
00040 uint8_t QF_intLockNest_;                       // interrupt-lock nesting level
00041 
00042 //............................................................................
00043 //lint -e970 -e971               ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function
00044 const char Q_ROM * Q_ROM_VAR QF::getVersion(void) {
00045     static char const Q_ROM Q_ROM_VAR version[] = "4.0.04";
00046     return version;

00048 //............................................................................
00049 void QF::add_(QActive *a) {
00050     uint8_t p = a->m_prio;
00051 
00052     Q_REQUIRE(((uint8_t)0 < p) && (p <= (uint8_t)QF_MAX_ACTIVE)
00053               && (active_[p] == (QActive *)0));
00054 
00055     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00056     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00057 
00058     active_[p] = a;            // registger the active object at this priority
00059 
00060     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_ACTIVE_ADD, QS::aoObj_, a)
00061         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00062         QS_OBJ_(a);                                       // the active object
00063         QS_U8_(p);                        // the priority of the active object
00064     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00065 
00066     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00067 }
00068 //............................................................................
00069 void QF::remove_(QActive const *a) {
00070     uint8_t p = a->m_prio;
00071 
00072     Q_REQUIRE(((uint8_t)0 < p) && (p <= (uint8_t)QF_MAX_ACTIVE)
00073               && (active_[p] == a));
00074 
00075     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00076     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00077 
00078     active_[p] = (QActive *)0;                   // free-up the priority level
00079 
00080     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QF_ACTIVE_REMOVE, QS::aoObj_, a)
00081         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00082         QS_OBJ_(a);                                       // the active object
00083         QS_U8_(p);                        // the priority of the active object
00084     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00085 
00086     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00087 }
